page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The main centre of entertainment is the{Cannon Hill Arts Centre}.It is sponsored by the Arts Councils,with additional income from fees etc. There is a cinema showing feature films and lesser known old movies. There is a theatre where various theatrical groups give performances. The{National Youth Theatre}is a residential group based at the centre. Regular puppet shows are also held. The area has various Bingo Halls converted from cinemas and a ten pin bowling alley. A number of public houses have folk and jazz musical evenings as well as dances.There are also a number of evening classes based on musical and theatrical studies. Birmingham University holds certain activities but these are generally limited to the faculty itself.
